metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4013 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the HTTP packet-parsing functionality of the LIVE555 RTSP server library version 0.92. A specially crafted packet can cause a stack-based buffer overflow, resulting in code execution. An attacker can send a packet to trigger this vulnerability. It was discovered that liveMedia  incorrectly handled certain network packets. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: liblivemedia: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
